tag.description: The Dial verb's Client noun specifies a client identifier to dial.

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET or POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Allowed Values:any url. Default Value:none

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:jenny or tommy. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Dial verb's Conference noun allows you to connect to a conference room.

attribute.name: muted
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: beep
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true

attribute.name: startConferenceOnEnter
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true

attribute.name: endConferenceOnExit
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: waitUrl
attribute.description: Allowed Values:TwiML url, empty string. Default Value:default Twilio hold music

attribute.name: waitMethod
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET or POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: maxParticipants
attribute.description: Allowed Values:positive integer <= 40. Default Value:40

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:moderated-conference-room or Room 1234. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Dial verb connects the current caller to another phone.

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:no default action for Dial

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Allowed Values:positive integer. Default Value:30 seconds

attribute.name: hangupOnStar
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: timeLimit
attribute.description: Allowed Values:positive integer (seconds). Default Value:14400 seconds (4 hours)

attribute.name: callerId
attribute.description: Allowed Values:a valid phone number, or client identifier if you are dialing a Client. Default Value:Caller's callerId

attribute.name: record
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example: 415-123-4567. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Enqueue verb enqueues the current call in a call queue.

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:none

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: waitUrl
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:http://s3.amazonaws.com/com.twilio.sounds.music/index.xml.

attribute.name: waitUrlMethod
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:support. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Gather verb collects digits that a caller enters into his or her telephone keypad.

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:no default action for Dial

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Allowed Values:positive integer. Default Value:30 seconds

attribute.name: finishOnKey
attribute.description: Allowed Values:any digit,#,*. Default Value:#

attribute.name: numDigits
attribute.description: Allowed Values: integer <= 1. Default Value:unlimited

tag.description: The Hangup verb ends a call.
Twilio.js allows you to establish audio connections between a web browser and a Twilio Application.

attribute.name: token
attribute.description: Initialize Twilio.Device with a capability token

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: rtc
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

attribute.name: params
attribute.description: The optional params argument is a JavaScript object where configuration settings can be passed in to .setup. Use the format: key1:value1,key2:value2..

attribute.name: withoutJs
attribute.description: Use withoutJs attribute for not writing twilio.js and jquery.js. Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:false

tag.description: The Leave verb transfers control of a call that is in a queue so that the caller exits the queue and execution continues with the next verb after the original Enqueue
The Dial verb's Number noun specifies a phone number to dial.

attribute.name: sendDigits
attribute.description: Allowed Values:any digits. Default Value:none. If you want to wait before sending the extension, so you add a few leading 'w' characters. Each 'w' character tells Twilio to wait 0.5 seconds instead of playing a digit.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Allowed Values:any url. Default Value:none

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET or POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:415-123-4567. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Pause verb waits silently for a specific number of seconds.

attribute.name: length
attribute.description: Allowed Values:integer < 0. Default Value:1 second

tag.description: The Play verb plays an audio file back to the caller. Twilio retrieves the file from a URL that you provide.

attribute.name: loop
attribute.description: Allowed Values:integer <= 0. Default Value:1

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:https://api.twilio.com/cowbell.mp3. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Dial verb's Queue noun specifies a queue to dial.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:none

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:support. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Record verb records the caller's voice and returns to you the URL of a file containing the audio recording.

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:current document URL

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Allowed Values:positive integer. Default Value:5 seconds

attribute.name: finishOnKey
attribute.description: Allowed Values:any digit,#,*. Default Value:1234567890*#

attribute.name: maxLength
attribute.description: Allowed Values:integer < 1. Default Value:3600 (1 hour)

attribute.name: transcribe
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:none

attribute.name: playBeep
attribute.description: Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true

tag.description: The Redirect verb transfers control of a call to the TwiML at a different URL.

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:http://pigeons.com/twiml.xml. You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Reject verb rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you.

attribute.name: reason
attribute.description: Allowed Values:rejected, busy. Default Value:rejected

tag.description: The root element of Twilio's XML Markup is the Response element.
The Say verb converts text to speech that is read back to the caller. Say is useful for development or saying dynamic text that is difficult to pre-record.

attribute.name: voice
attribute.description: Allowed Values:man, woman. Default Value:man

attribute.name: language
attribute.description: Allowed Values:en, en-gb, es, fr, de, it. Default Value:en

attribute.name: loop
attribute.description: Allowed Values:integer <= 0. Default Value:1

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:Chapeau! You can wrap inside open and close tag.

tag.description: The Dial verb's Sip noun lets you set up VoIP sessions by using SIP - Session Initiation Protocol.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Allowed Values:call screening url. Default Value:none.

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: username
attribute.description: Username for SIP authentication

attribute.name: passowrd
attribute.description: Password for SIP authentication.

tag.description: The Sms verb sends an SMS message to a phone number during a phone call.

attribute.name: to
attribute.description: Allowed Values:phone number.

attribute.name: from
attribute.description: Allowed Values:phone number.

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:none.

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST

attribute.name: statusCallback
attribute.description: Allowed Values:relative or absolute URL. Default Value:none

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Example:The king stay the king. You can wrap inside open and close tag.
